section.title: Btrfs
section.para: The btrfs utility is a toolbox for managing btrfs filesystems. There are command groups to work with subvolumes, devices, for whole filesystem or other specific actions.
section.screen: yum install btrfs-progs

section.title: btrfs 格式化
section.screen: # mkfs.btrfs /dev/sdb1
# mkfs.btrfs /dev/sdb2 -L /backup

section.title: 快照 snapshot
section.screen: 创建快照 # btrfs subvolume snapshot /www /www/backup_2012 查看快照 # btrfs subvolume list -a /www 挂在快照 # mount -t btrfs -o subvol=backup_2012 /dev/md127p5 /mnt/snap 删除快照 # btrfs subvolume delete /www/backup_2012 Delete subvolume '/www/backup_2012'

section.title: 挂载 btrfs
section.screen: # mkdir /mnt/btrfs # mount /dev/sdb1 /mnt/btrfs

# df -Th Filesystem Type Size Used Avail Use% Mounted on /dev/sda1 ext4 49G 15G 32G 32% / tmpfs tmpfs 32G 264K 32G 1% /dev/shm /dev/sda3 ext4 52G 1.3G 48G 3% /var /dev/sdb1 btrfs 2.0T 14G 2.0T 1% /mnt/btrfs

针对 SSD 的优化: # mount –t btrfs –o SSD /dev/sda5 /btrfsdisk
打开压缩功能： # mount –t btrfs –o compress /dev/sda5 /btrfsdisk
